com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.swinginadapters

Class AnimationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
        • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.swinginadapters.AnimationAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SectionIndexer, SpinnerAdapter, ListViewSetter, Swappable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlphaInAnimationAdapter, ResourceAnimationAdapter, ScaleInAnimationAdapter, SingleAnimationAdapter

    public abstract class AnimationAdapter
extends BaseAdapterDecorator
    A BaseAdapterDecorator class which applies multiple Animators at once to views when they are first shown. The Animators applied include the animations specified in getAnimators(ViewGroup, View), plus an alpha transition.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimationAdapter

        protected AnimationAdapter(BaseAdapter baseAdapter)
        Creates a new AnimationAdapter, wrapping given BaseAdapter.
        Parameters:
        baseAdapter - the BaseAdapter to wrap.

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Call this method to reset animation status on all views. The next time BaseAdapterDecorator.notifyDataSetChanged() is called on the base adapter, all views will animate again. Will also call setShouldAnimate(boolean) with a value of true.

      • setShouldAnimate

        public void setShouldAnimate(boolean shouldAnimate)
        Set whether to animate the Views or not.
        Parameters:
        shouldAnimate - true if the Views should be animated.

      • setShouldAnimateFromPosition

        public void setShouldAnimateFromPosition(int position)
        Set the starting position for which items should animate. Given position will animate as well. Will also call setShouldAnimate(true).
        Parameters:
        position - the position.

      • setShouldAnimateNotVisible

        public void setShouldAnimateNotVisible()
        Set the starting position for which items should animate as the first position which isn't currently visible on screen. This call is also valid when the Views haven't been drawn yet. Will also call setShouldAnimate(true).

      • getView

        public final View getView(int position,
           View convertView,
           ViewGroup parent)
        Specified by:
        getView in interface Adapter
        Overrides:
        getView in class BaseAdapterDecorator

      • setInitialDelayMillis

        public void setInitialDelayMillis(long delayMillis)
        Sets the delay in milliseconds before the first animation should start. Defaults to .
        Parameters:
        delayMillis - the time in milliseconds.

      • setAnimationDelayMillis

        public void setAnimationDelayMillis(long delayMillis)
        Sets the delay in milliseconds before an animation of a view should start. Defaults to .
        Parameters:
        delayMillis - the time in milliseconds.

      • setAnimationDurationMillis

        public void setAnimationDurationMillis(long durationMillis)
        Sets the duration of the animation in milliseconds. Defaults to .
        Parameters:
        durationMillis - the time in milliseconds.

      • getAnimators

        protected abstract com.nineoldandroids.animation.Animator[] getAnimators(ViewGroup parent,
                                                    View view)
        Returns the Animators to apply to the views. In addition to the returned Animators, an alpha transition will be applied to the view.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of the view
        view - The view that will be animated, as retrieved by getView().

      • onSaveInstanceState

        public Parcelable onSaveInstanceState()
        Returns a Parcelable object containing the AnimationAdapter's current dynamic state.

      • onRestoreInstanceState

        public void onRestoreInstanceState(Parcelable parcelable)
        Restores this AnimationAdapter's state.
        Parameters:
        parcelable - the Parcelable object previously returned by onSaveInstanceState().
